item.title: Cultures Portal
item.description: 2nd Realm Central Continent Morelland Proto-Morellic Modern Morellic Sarvara Sarvaran Sarvaran Poetry Empire of the Petrified Child Stonechild-imperial Snixia Proto-Snixian

item.title: Empire of the Petrified Child
item.description: Culture Stonechild Imperial culture was heavily influenced by the mythology surrounding the Petrified Child. Thus, religion was a big factor in the workings of society.

item.title: Morellic Culture
item.description: The Morellic culture existed at around 7,000YA. The culture began as the two tribes, Rhohita and Cervina, met. Language Proto-morellic was the language spoken by the early morellic culture.

item.title: Neth River Civilisation
item.description: The Neth River Civilisation existed in 7,000 YA. Location The Neth River Civilisation was located along the Neth River, which flowed from the Nessaui lake into the Sarvaran Gulf.

item.title: Ram's Head Migration
item.description: Ram’s Head Migration is the name given to the Morellic cultural practice of placing babies in shelters built atop of the antlers of sheep.

item.title: Sarvara
item.description: The Sarvaran Civilisation existed around 7,000YA, and spoke Sarvaran. Habitat The Sarvaran Minikin store clay taken from nearby river banks in their cheeks and use this clay in conjunction with reinforcing twigs in order to create their iconic clay shelters.

item.title: Sarvaran Music
item.description: Instruments The Rainslug The Rainslug was originally a children’s toy made of many hollow hemispheres linked by ball-and-socket joints, taking an appearance reminiscent of a slug.
